SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Oracle Systems?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {below} Oracle Systems in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Oracle Systems}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Patent Applications?

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patent Applications fall between 30479.56 and 33687.94 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Patent Applications go below 25786.60 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patent Applications exceed 38380.90 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1998, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 1995?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1987 and 1998 was {larger} than between 1989 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1991, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1990 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1986 and 1991 was {lower} than between 1990 and 1996.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 1983 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 1983 was {lower} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1993, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1986 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1989 and 1993 was {higher} than between 1986 and 1990.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Echo Dynamics} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Oracle Systems, Crimson Group, Echo Dynamics, Nova Industries}.
